name: Metapod
author: Ken Sugimori
flavor_text: A steel-hard shell protects its tender body. It quietly endures hardships while awaiting evolution.

poke_power.name: Emerge
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Metapod is your Active Pokémon, you may flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for a card that evolves from Metapod and put it onto Metapod. (This counts as evolving Metapod.) Shuffle your deck afterward. This power can’t be used if Metapod is affected by a Special Condition.
